item.title: @elonmusk: Elevating the Status of Motherhood Solves Low Birthrates: The Extraordinary Case of Mongolia For 68 ...
item.description: Elevating the Status of Motherhood Solves Low Birthrates: The Extraordinary Case of Mongolia For 68 years, Mongolian leaders have given the Order of Maternal Glory to mothers. This raised the status of motherhood and helped forge a remarkably pronatal culture. üßµ, please share!

item.title: @elonmusk: All the BBC does is lie. ICE did not, and has never, "used a child as bait." The child was ABANDONED...
item.description: All the BBC does is lie. ICE did not, and has never, "used a child as bait." The child was ABANDONED. On January 20, ICE conducted a targeted operation to arrest Adrian Alexander Conejo Arias an illegal alien from Ecuador who was RELEASED into the U.S. by the Biden administration. As agents approached the driver Adrian Alexander Conejo Arias, fled on foot ‚Äî abandoning his child. For the child‚Äôs safety, one of our ICE officers remained with the child while the other officers apprehended Conejo Arias. Parents can take control of their departure and receive a free flight and $2,600 using the CBP Home app.

item.title: @elonmusk: This was amazing. When I got off the operating table, I could already tell that I was able to see, w...
item.description: This was amazing. When I got off the operating table, I could already tell that I was able to see, with a bit of haziness. When I woke up from a short nap a few hours later, I could see everything very clearly. My eyes aren't dry, I don't feel any pain. I love modern medicine!

item.title: @elonmusk: Elon Musk: "As a kid, I read a lot of science fiction fantasy books, and comic books. And I always l...
item.description: Elon Musk: "As a kid, I read a lot of science fiction fantasy books, and comic books. And I always liked technology I didn't expect to be where I am today; that seems incredibly implausible. I was inspired by reading books about the future, about science fiction. And I guess I want to make science fiction not fiction forever. At some point, turn science fiction to science fact."
